component.name: Flux Archive Manager

description.p: Flux Archive Manager is a modern, cross-platform application designed for efficient archive management. It provides both an intuitive graphical interface and powerful command-line tools for handling various archive formats.

ul.li: Support for multiple archive formats: ZIP, TAR, 7Z, and more
Intuitive drag-and-drop interface for easy file management
High-performance processing with real-time progress tracking
Command-line interface for automation and scripting
Modern C++23 codebase with robust error handling
Extensible plugin architecture for future format support

description.p: Whether you're a casual user looking to extract downloaded archives or a power user needing advanced archive manipulation capabilities, Flux provides the tools you need with a clean, modern interface.
